description: Cathepsin G (CTSG) is a protein that in humans encoded by the CTSG gene. The gene for CTSG was located on chromosome 14q11.2, spans 2.7kb, and consists five exons and four introns, pro-CTSG was a 255-amino-acid residue protein. After cleavage of the signal peptide, two amino acids and 11 amino acids remain at the N-terminal and C-terminal side of pro-CTSG, respectively.
name: Cathepsin G Antibodies and Antigens
